changeSet.author: jenik
changeSet.sql: insert into API_KEY_SCOPES_ENUM select id, 0 from API_KEY where SCOPES like '%translations.view%'; insert into API_KEY_SCOPES_ENUM select id, 1 from API_KEY where SCOPES like '%translations.edit%'; insert into API_KEY_SCOPES_ENUM select id, 2 from API_KEY where SCOPES like '%keys.edit%';

changeSet.author: jenik
jenik
changeSet.sql: UPDATE translation set state = 1 where state = 2 or state = 4; UPDATE translation set state = 2 where state = 3;

changeSet.author: jenik
changeSet.sql: UPDATE translation_aud set state = 1 where state = 2 or state = 4; UPDATE translation_aud set state = 2 where state = 3;
